string-array.name: falling_phrases
string-array.item: will you believe me when im covered in blood?
my love runs deeper than words,
more than i´ll ever tell you.
i was young enough to run, old enough to ache.
When boiling water doesn’t burn anymore.
Because we always want to return.

string-array.name: rising_phrases
string-array.item: stay up late, wake up late.
Love, don’t cry, I see light in your sorrows.
